ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2002_01_10: I like your outfit today! You look amazing!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’d love for you
to go shopping with me again!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2101_01_10: I found this by chance, and I want you to have it.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I hope you’ll find it useful.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2102_01_10: This is for you. Please use it!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2102_02_10: I bet you’ll make good use of it!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I wanted to give this
to you.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2103_02_10: Consider it thanks for always helping me out.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
It’s nice to show someone gratitude like this, don’t
you think?
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
If you have some time, do you want to talk for
a bit?
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Time flies so quickly when I’m having a chat with
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Oh, thank you! I’ll treasure it!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
You’re giving this to me? What a
wonderful surprise!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Thanks! Next time, I’ll give you a gift that’ll make
you happy!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2402_01_10: I had a great time. Thank you.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Seems like we’re out of time. What a shame...
I wanted to talk more.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I’ll be looking forward to next time. Let’s talk
about a lot of things then!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot of sync pairs here, so I tend to check
out everyone’s fashion!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I think it’s great how everyone’s style reflects their
personality. I learn a lot just from being here.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Pasio has a lot of beautiful scenery, so I bet it
would look great wherever you choose to shoot
a PR video.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
My favorite spot has to be the city center, where
you can find lots of people.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
It feels like home, so I bet I’d feel relaxed during
the shoot!
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8003_0701_01_10: Quickly striking a pose on request is really hard.
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8003_0701_02_10: I tend to think too much and end up looking stiff...
ch0130_00_serena_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Maybe if I learn from Elesa or Nessa, I’d get
better at it...
